original_text: It is my pleasure to tell you about the miraculous signs and wonders that the Most High God has performed for me.
korean_text: 지극히 높으신 하나님이 내게 행하신 이적과 놀라운 일을 내가 알게 하기를 즐겨 하노라

sentences.original_text: It is my pleasure to tell you
about the miraculous signs and wonders
that the Most High God has performed
